alerts.text: I am on an extended break from The Sims 4 and have not tested my mods for the last few patches. I will aim to test and fix them this coming weekend (July 5-6). Keep an eye on my website, Discord server, Patreon, or Bluesky for updates.
I am aware of some reports that Language Barriers was impacted by the July 1st patch. I advise against playing with it in your game until I get a chance to dig deeper and release an update if needed.
